derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from medieval Latin aqueus, from Latin aqua 'water'

entry.def: In chemistry, an aqueous solution or cream has water as its base.

example.ex: ...an aqueous solution containing various sodium salts.
...a soap substitute such as an aqueous cream, available from chemists.
example.tran: 药店出售的水质乳液之类的香皂替代品

means.word_mean: 1. similar to or containing or dissolved in water;

stems_affixes.word_buile: court宫廷+eous有……的→来自宫廷的礼节→有礼貌的
gas气体+eous有……的→adj.气体的,气态的
hetero异种+gen产生+eous有……的→产生不同的
homo同+gen产生+eous有……的→产生相同的
lign木头+eous有……的→adj.木质的,木头的
right正确+eous有……的→adj.正直的,公正的
op不+aque水→不像水一样→不透明的
sub下+aqueous[adj.水的, 水成的]→adj.水下的
